text: The men's 110 metres hurdles event at the 2001 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Amsterdam, Netherlands, at Olympisch Stadion on 14 and 15 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Artur Budziłło ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Felipe Vivancos ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Chris Baillie ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 15 July Wind: 0.4 m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
